00011 class Log{
00012     public:
00013         void log(std::string message) {
00014 #           ifdef DEBUG
00015                 std::cerr << message << std::endl;
00016 #           endif
00017         }
00018 
00019         Log &operator<<(const std::string &message) {
00020 #           ifdef DEBUG
00021                 std::cerr << message;
00022 #           endif
00023             return *this;
00024         }
00025 
00026         Log &operator<<(long x) {
00027             return operator<<(Globals::Instance().itoa(x));
00028         }
00029 
00030         Log &operator<<(unsigned long x) {
00031             return operator<<(Globals::Instance().itoa(x));
00032         }
00033 
00034         Log &operator<<(double x) {
00035             return operator<<(Globals::Instance().ftoa(x));
00036         }
00037 
00038 private:
00039     Log() { }
00040     Log(const Log &);
00041     Log &operator=(const Log &);
00042     ~Log() { }
00043

00045 };
